### build a 10% sample 

```{r}
# sampling - 15 sec
source('./helpers/sampler.R')
createSample("en_US", c("blogs","news","twitter"), 10)
``` 


### Fast tokenization & unique word list

```{r}
# fast tokenization - 10sec
source('./helpers/tokenizer.R') # custom split: remove ', add =<>~*&_/\ plus numbers
src <- "./data/en_US.news.sample10.txt"
G1_list <- tokenize(src, 1, TRUE)
rm(src,tokenize)
```


### Replace unknown words (from qdap dictionary)

```{r}
ptm <- proc.time()
source('./helpers/wordChecker.R')
wordChecked <- wordCheck(G1_list)
G1_list <- wordChecked[[1]]
unk_freq <- wordChecked[[2]]
proc.time() - ptm
```
